docs.title: Adding a blog to your site
docs.text:
This example shows how to add a blog to your site.

It shows how to:

  • configure the mkdocs.yml to activate and configure the plugin
  • set up a directory structure in your docs/ folder
  • add an .authors.yml file with author information

The naming of the files containing the blog posts is just a suggestion, you can name them any way you like. What matters is the meta data at in the header.
